title: Papercut Configuration
description: Configuration for Papercut - Print your tickets on a real receipt printer

$schema.description: JSON Schema reference for IDE support

usb_vendor_id.description: USB vendor ID in hex format (e.g., 0x04b8 for Epson). Run lsusb (Linux) or ioreg (macOS) to find your printer's ID

usb_product_id.description: USB product ID in hex format. Varies by printer model (TM-T20III: 0x0e28, TM-T88V: 0x0202)

header.description: Receipt header section (company information). Set any field to empty string to hide it

logo_disabled.description: Set to true to disable logo printing. Logo must be named 'logo.png' in /config directory

company_name.description: Company name displayed at top of receipt. Set to empty string to hide

address_line1.description: First line of company address. Set to empty string to hide

address_line2.description: Second line of company address. Set to empty string to hide

phone.description: Company phone number. Set to empty string to hide

url.description: Company website URL. Set to empty string to hide

footer.description: Receipt footer section (QR code and footer text)

disabled.description: Set to true to completely hide the footer section

qr_code_disabled.description: Set to true to hide just the QR code while keeping footer text

qr_code_size.description: QR code size for ESC/POS printers (1=smallest, 8=largest)

qr_code_title.description: Text displayed above the QR code. Set to empty string to hide

footer_text.description: Text displayed at the bottom of the receipt. Set to empty string to hide

disabled.description: Set to true to disable Linear webhook processing

signing_secret.description: Linear webhook signing secret for HMAC-SHA256 verification. Required if not disabled. Get from Linear → Settings → API → Webhooks

max_title_length.description: Maximum characters for issue title before truncation

max_description_length.description: Maximum characters for issue description before truncation
